name: Thoroughbred Breeder
overview: Thoroughbred Breeder is a horse racing simulation game from Hect. The player raises horses to be raced on various circuits, ensuring they are bred and raised correctly and sold off once the time is right. In addition, the player can bet on and watch races. The goal is to amass a large fortune from their shrewd decisions. The Thoroughbred Breeder series would have two more sequels for the Super Famicom, as well as two for the Sony PlayStation.
